creator: wbudreau@cotagesoft.com
text: The page above should have better links to bugzilla. Also, on page I was indirectly referenced to, there should be a link to Search the Tomcat 5 bug database Currently there are only links to tomcat 3 and 4 categories. I apologize for posting this to this Tomcat bug database, but there is no mail address for submitting these web page requests without joining a mailing list, nor is there a component of the tomcat/apache bugzilla database (I could discover) which allows for this type of request.
